com.here.android.mpa.venues3d

Interface VenueNavigationManager.VenueNavigationManagerListener

  • Enclosing class:
    VenueNavigationManager

    public static interface VenueNavigationManager.VenueNavigationManagerListener
    An interface for responding to navigation events sent by the VenueNavigationManager.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCurrentManeuverChanged(VenueManeuver maneuver, VenueManeuver nextManeuver)
      Called when the current (upcoming) maneuver is updated.
      void onDestinationReached()
      Called when the destination of turn-by-turn navigation is reached.
      void onPositionLost()
      Called when the navigation manager loses its indoor position.
      void onPositionRestored()
      Called when the navigation manager finds its indoor position.
      void onRerouteBegin()
      Called when rerouting is triggered due to the user leaving the current route section.
      void onRerouteEnd()
      Called when rerouting, due to the user leaving the current route section, has finished.
      void onRouteSectionUpdated(VenueRoute routeSection, CombinedRoute combinedRoute)
      Called when a change is made to the route section being navigated.

    • Method Detail

      • onDestinationReached

        void onDestinationReached()
        Called when the destination of turn-by-turn navigation is reached.

      • onCurrentManeuverChanged

        void onCurrentManeuverChanged(VenueManeuver maneuver,
                              VenueManeuver nextManeuver)
        Called when the current (upcoming) maneuver is updated. The "current" maneuver is the upcoming, or next, maneuver to be taken. The "next" maneuver is actually the maneuver to be taken after the current maneuver.
        Parameters:
        maneuver - The current (upcoming) maneuver to be made.
        nextManeuver - The maneuver to be made AFTER THE CURRENT MANEUVER.

      • onPositionLost

        void onPositionLost()
        Called when the navigation manager loses its indoor position.

      • onPositionRestored

        void onPositionRestored()
        Called when the navigation manager finds its indoor position.

      • onRouteSectionUpdated

        void onRouteSectionUpdated(VenueRoute routeSection,
                           CombinedRoute combinedRoute)
        Called when a change is made to the route section being navigated. This can occur after successful rerouting due to the user leaving the current route (see VenueNavigationManager.VenueNavigationManagerListener.onRerouteBegin()).
        Parameters:
        routeSection - VenueRoute representing the route section that was set.
        combinedRoute - CombinedRoute representing the current route.

      • onRerouteBegin

        void onRerouteBegin()
        Called when rerouting is triggered due to the user leaving the current route section. If a new route section is successfully calculated, it is immediately applied to the current navigation session and VenueNavigationManager.VenueNavigationManagerListener.onRouteSectionUpdated(VenueRoute, CombinedRoute) is called. After rerouting, the VenueNavigationManager.VenueNavigationManagerListener.onRerouteEnd() is called.

      • onRerouteEnd

        void onRerouteEnd()
        Called when rerouting, due to the user leaving the current route section, has finished. This method just means an attempt to reroute finished and does not guarantee that a new route was successfully created.
